page.title: AngoraSix Methodology Guide
page.description: A practical roadmap to implement fair, transparent and efficient project management.

title: AngoraSix Methodology Guide
subtitle: A lightweight roadmap to run projects fairly and efficiently. The guide adapts to your context, highlighting the most relevant activities and tools at each stage.
description: Singular, like a heartbeat in your chest. Unique, exactly the same as the rest — El Chojin

presets.title: Quick Presets
presets.tooltip: Preconfigured scenarios that auto-adjust key aspects for common project types.

startup.label: Early-Stage Startup
startup.tooltip: New product, small team, closed development, no revenue yet. Focus on validation and basic structure.

venture.label: Mature Venture
venture.tooltip: Validated product, experienced management, steady revenue. Focus on optimization and growth.

community.label: Open Community
community.tooltip: Collaborative project, decentralized governance, open to contributors, community-driven development.

subproject.label: Sub-project
subproject.tooltip: Part of a larger organization, owned by a team, validated scope, stable funding and processes.

traditional.label: Traditional Manager
traditional.tooltip: Established product, mature management, centralized control, steady revenue, classic corporate structure.

product.label: Product
product.tooltip: Current state of your product or service

alignment.title: 1. Alignment
alignment.description: Team checks and preparation, align expectations and validate the project’s foundation before moving into implementation.

setup.title: 2. Project Setup
setup.description: Define governance rules and financial structures, and configure the tools and integrations needed for smooth operation.

implementation.title: 3. Implementation & Iterative Review
implementation.description: Run agile ceremonies, distribute value, and continuously refine processes, metrics and governance as the project evolves.

fairness-assessment.title: Define What’s “Fair”
fairness-assessment.description: An initial space to openly discuss what each member considers ‘fair’ in the project. We explore perceptions of equity, expected contributions and recognition criteria to build a shared understanding.
fairness-assessment.help: With A6 Compass, we facilitate and guide workshops that turn abstract conversations about fairness into clear, actionable agreements tailored to your context.
objectives: Understand each member’s expectations around fairness
Spot potential tensions or misaligned views on contributions and rewards
Reach an initial set of agreements that feel clear and fair to the team

team-readiness.title: Team Readiness
team-readiness.description: A practical diagnosis of the team’s readiness to start or scale: skills, motivation, availability and collaboration capacity to identify strengths and gaps.
team-readiness.help: A6 Compass runs a guided assessment and provides templates to map competencies, commitment levels and risks before moving forward.
objectives: Map each member’s skills, availability and motivations
Identify capability or resource gaps that could slow progress
Ensure baseline conditions are in place for sustainable execution

team-alignment.title: Team Alignment
team-alignment.description: Consolidate a shared vision, values and goals that guide decisions and collaboration. The team defines its purpose, working principles and success criteria.
team-alignment.help: With A6 Compass we facilitate co-creation sessions to align purpose, values and goals, turning the shared vision into a concrete operating frame.
objectives: Build a shared purpose and vision
Define values and principles that guide decisions
Agree on measurable goals and success criteria

management-definition.title: Management & Roles Definition
management-definition.description: Design how the team will operate in practice: roles, responsibilities, decision processes and communication channels.
management-definition.help: A6 Compass helps define lightweight management structures, clarifying responsibilities without adding bureaucracy.
objectives: Define the team structure and key functions
Clarify individual and shared responsibilities
Set simple, transparent decision-making processes

product-prevalidation.title: Product Pre-validation
product-prevalidation.description: Validate key assumptions about the problem, opportunity and value proposition before committing significant time or resources.
product-prevalidation.help: With A6 Compass we guide early validation, helping the team test ideas quickly with real signals, following Lean Startup principles.
objectives: Verify problem-solution fit
Explore real market or community demand
Refine the value proposition for next iterations

product-analysis.title: Existing Product Analysis
product-analysis.description: Review running products or initiatives to identify opportunities for improvement, growth and efficiency.
product-analysis.help: A6 Compass facilitates analysis of metrics and user feedback to adjust product strategy without losing the original purpose.
objectives: Assess current product-market fit
Identify optimization and scalability opportunities
Check alignment between strategy and original purpose

trainings.title: Training & Enablement
trainings.description: Equip the team with the methods, tools and collaborative practices needed to operate effectively within the AngoraSix frame—while fostering broader capabilities for medium- and long-term success.
trainings.help: A6 Compass blends hands-on workshops, guided sessions and curated resources. Beyond AngoraSix concepts, we cover complementary methods that strengthen autonomy and execution (Lean Startup, Design Thinking, agile practices, and more).
objectives: Deepen understanding of AngoraSix principles and practices
Develop skills and judgment for effective collaboration and management
Provide a learning roadmap that grows with the project

governance-rules.title: Governance Rules
governance-rules.description: Define decision-making, power distribution and conflict-resolution rules. These rules are the base of AngoraSix’s dynamic governance.
governance-rules.help: A6 Layer parametrizes these rules so decisions, votes and reviews are applied automatically and transparently, reducing friction.
objectives: Set clear, verifiable decision processes
Define voting mechanisms and rule updates
Formalize power distribution and participation

financial-rules.title: Financial Rules
financial-rules.description: Design the financial model that governs how revenue is distributed, expenses are managed and value creation is recorded.
financial-rules.help: In A6 Layer you can define distribution parameters and automated formulas based on contributions, ensuring traceability and fairness in every transaction.
objectives: Define revenue and expense distribution models
Link contributions to rewards through clear rules
Enable traceability and automatic financial reporting

contribution-integrations.title: Contribution Integrations
contribution-integrations.description: Connect external tools (GitHub, Trello, Jira, etc.) so contributions are recorded automatically and feed ownership and fairness calculations.
contribution-integrations.help: A6 Layer acts as an integration layer that syncs real team activity into the fairness model—without adding operational burden.
objectives: Integrate existing work tools for automatic capture of contributions
Reduce manual work and errors in contribution tracking
Consolidate ownership and contribution metrics in one place

shared-wallet-setup.title: Shared Wallet
shared-wallet-setup.description: Set up a shared or multi-sig wallet to manage project funds transparently and securely under team-agreed rules.
shared-wallet-setup.help: A6 Layer integrates with both crypto and traditional solutions to enable distributed, verifiable resource management. Distributions can run automatically according to your defined rules.
objectives: Enable a shared wallet with distributed control
Automate payouts according to real contributions and rules
Guarantee traceability and transparency for all transactions

management-tools-setup.title: Management Tools Setup
management-tools-setup.description: Select and configure task and communication tools to support the fairness and governance framework in practice.
management-tools-setup.help: A6 Compass advises on choosing and configuring tools that fit your team’s size and maturity and integrate well with A6 Layer.
objectives: Choose tools appropriate to team size and maturity
Configure workflows compatible with A6 governance
Ensure the team can operate clearly and autonomously

metrics-setup.title: Metrics & Tracking
metrics-setup.description: Define indicators that make progress, collaboration and fairness visible—without adding unnecessary bureaucracy.
metrics-setup.help: A6 Compass helps define meaningful metrics, and A6 Layer provides integrated dashboards to follow their evolution and inform decisions with real data.
objectives: Define relevant health, fairness and progress metrics (KPIs)
Configure integrated dashboards in A6 Layer
Promote informed, adaptive decision-making

job-marketplace.title: Open Contributions Marketplace
job-marketplace.description: Open the project to external collaboration with clear rules and traceable compensation.
job-marketplace.help: A6 Layer includes an open opportunities board where teams can publish tasks, receive contributions and automatically apply fairness rules.
objectives: Safely expand the contributor network with transparency
Publish tasks and roles with associated rewards
Record and compensate external work according to A6 rules

agile-ceremonies.title: Agile Ceremonies
agile-ceremonies.description: Adopt an iterative, collaborative work system through lightweight agile ceremonies (planning, standups, reviews, retros) that drive focus, cadence and continuous improvement.
agile-ceremonies.help: A6 Compass helps tailor a lightweight method to your team’s size and maturity, aligning ceremonies with metric reviews, rules and ownership updates.
objectives: Establish a sustainable cadence with clear cycles
Create regular spaces for communication and reflection
Promote continuous improvement and transparent progress

ownership-revision.title: Ownership & Rules Review
ownership-revision.description: A lightweight, iterative process to adjust ownership, compensation and operating rules as the project evolves. It naturally ties into agile ceremonies, avoiding overhead while ensuring rules keep matching real work and contributions.
ownership-revision.help: A6 Compass facilitates collective reflection and helps spot early signs of imbalance. A6 Layer provides up-to-date contribution data to run small, transparent adjustments.
objectives: Periodically check alignment between contributions, rules and ownership
Make evidence-based micro-adjustments with team consensus
Keep rules and compensation aligned with how the project actually works

income-distribution.title: Income Distribution
income-distribution.description: Run automatic or semi-automatic distributions according to predefined rules—ensuring fair, auditable compensation.
income-distribution.help: A6 Layer handles calculations and transfers so each cycle can be validated or audited with full transparency.
objectives: Apply distribution rules based on ownership and contributions
Ensure each member receives a fair payout
Keep verifiable records of every transaction

governance.title: Active Governance
governance.description: Enable collective decision-making, proposals and rule evolution in a democratic, auditable way.
governance.help: A6 Layer lets you create and vote on proposals where you work, ensuring traceability, participation and legitimate outcomes.
objectives: Enable equitable participation in key decisions
Keep clear records of votes and results
Foster responsible, distributed governance

ownership-reports.title: Ownership Reports
ownership-reports.description: Generate and view clear reports on ownership and contribution evolution—transparency without extra operational burden.
ownership-reports.help: Reports in A6 Layer update automatically and are available on demand. A6 Compass helps interpret them in context and offers situation-specific guidance.
objectives: Maintain continuous visibility into contributions and ownership
Support informed decisions without extra meetings or processes
Provide practical, contextual guidance based on the data

financial-reports.title: Financial Reports
financial-reports.description: Simple, real-time visibility into the project’s financial flow—income, expenses and distributions—transparent and low-overhead.
financial-reports.help: A6 Layer consolidates relevant financial movements and provides clear visualizations. A6 Compass helps read the signals, anticipate risks and adjust decisions to your reality.
objectives: Keep transparent, no-manual tracking of income, expenses and distributions
Provide an integrated view of the project’s financial state
Enable quick, contextual decisions from clear data

health-metrics.title: Project Health Indicators
health-metrics.description: Track team and project pulse with key metrics on activity, participation, balance and wellbeing—catching early signs of risk or misalignment.
health-metrics.help: A6 Layer provides automatic indicators on participation, contributions and balance. A6 Compass adds qualitative analysis and tailored recommendations to sustain motivation and performance.
objectives: Detect early signals of overload, misalignment or low participation
Maintain balance between effort, recognition and wellbeing
Promote continuous adjustments for a healthy collaboration environment

general-roadmap.title: Roadmap Review
general-roadmap.description: Update the project roadmap based on learnings, shifting priorities or team capacity—keeping strategic focus while you execute.
general-roadmap.help: A6 Compass can guide roadmap reviews using real progress data and previous-cycle learnings, promoting evidence-based decisions.
objectives: Review progress against the original roadmap
Reprioritize tasks and goals based on current context
Align the team on next steps and shared focus

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Our team can guide you through adopting the AngoraSix Methodology in your project.
